title: Duo with me get out of bronze.
body:
I'm bronze 4 cause of afk and trolls was silver last season looking for a partner to get out of bronze
Im not bad so don't think this is just want to win.

replies.body: there needs to be justice.. good players like u belong silver like wtf riot why u so mean?

{{champion:6}} 


not even kidding he got me out of bronze along with malz
I main support. So if you main adc by all means ill be happy to duo. im a b4 with low lp after losing promos 3 times due to afk's and/or trolls.
Thank you all for the comments I will add you when nessesary

Ill duo with you today, just add me ingame.
Krates
